pages.text: $(li)The Mossy Tooth is an item that can only be dropped by the $(l:patchouli:bosses/swampjaw)Swampjaw$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:tools/meet_your_fight/caged_heart)Caged Heart$(/l), a $(l)Mershy Delight$(), the $(l:patchouli:weapons/depth_star)Depth Star$(/l), a Music Disc and the $(l:patchouli:tools/meet_your_fight/bone_raker)Bone Raker$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).
